choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.  I can't have dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, or cashews
Sure! Here is a sample meal plan for you:
- Breakfast: Omelette with spinach, tomatoes, and mushrooms (use non-dairy milk and no garlic or onion powder)
- Snack: Apple slices with almond butter (no cashews or pistachios)
- Lunch: Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potato and steamed broccoli (no honey, dairy, or nuts)
- Snack: Carrot sticks with hummus (no garlic or almonds)
- Dinner: Baked salmon with quinoa and roasted asparagus (no cashews or pistachios)
I hope you find this meal plan helpful! Let me know if you need any further assistance.
